item.title: 央行行长认为哥伦比亚加息 "在望
item.description: 一位高级决策者表示，如果通胀前景进一步恶化，哥伦比亚可能需要考虑两年多来的首次加息。【原文：Colombia may need to consider its first interest rate increase in more than two years if the inflation outlook further deteriorates, according to a senior policymaker.】

item.title: 乔盖蒂称意大利银行可为梅洛尼减税提供资金支持
item.description: 财政部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）表示，银行和其他金融机构将有能力应对政府为资助意大利中产阶级减税而提出的额外税收负担。【原文：Finance Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said banks and other financial institutions will be able to cope with the additional tax burden the government is proposing to help finance a tax cut for Italy’s middle classes.】

item.title: 美联储政策基准利率一个月内第三次上调
item.description: 由于美联储的资产负债表缩减和国债拍卖结算继续对资金市场造成压力，有效联邦基金利率在一个月内第三次走高。【原文：The effective federal funds rate edged higher for the third time in a month as the Federal Reserve’s balance-sheet runoff and Treasury auction settlements continue to weigh on funding markets.】

item.title: 加密货币崩盘冲击零售业，华尔街竞相抛售高风险 ETF
item.description: 当加密货币价格炙手可热时，华尔街也扑了个空。发行商们争先恐后地申请与另类币（altcoins —）相关的交易所交易基金（ETF），数量之多令人眼花缭乱。然后就是上周的暴跌。【原文：When crypto prices were running hot, Wall Street pounced. Issuers rushed to file for a dizzying number of ETFs tied to altcoins — the volatile, thinly traded tokens that live on the speculative edge of digital finance. Then came the past week’s crash.】

item.title: 意大利银行因贸易紧张局势下调 2026 年经济增长预测
item.description: 意大利银行下调了明年的经济增长预期，因为这个欧元区第三大经济体正努力应对全球贸易紧张局势对出口造成的压力。【原文：The Bank of Italy cut its growth forecast for next year as the euro zone’s third-biggest economy struggles with global trade tensions that weigh on exports.】

item.title: 各州数据显示美国上周初请失业金人数下降
item.description: 根据对联邦政府停摆期间公布的未经调整的州一级申请数据的分析，上周美国失业救济金申请人数有所下降。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits fell last week, according to analyses of unadjusted state-level filings released during the federal government shutdown.】

item.title: 财政部以平行汇率买入比索，阿根廷债券上涨
item.description: 美国财政部部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周五在 X 上宣布，美国财政部周四以被投资者称为 "蓝筹股掉期 "的平行汇率买入阿根廷比索，从而提振了该国的债券。【原文：The US Treasury bought Argentine pesos Thursday at the parallel exchange rate known among investors as the “blue chip swap,” Secretary Scott Bessent announced on X Friday, boosting the nation’s bonds.】

item.title: Vista 与高盛合作，在 10 亿美元交易中捆绑基金股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Vista Equity Partners 正计划出售由其私人资本基金股权支持的债券。【原文：Vista Equity Partners is planning to sell bonds backed by stakes in its private capital funds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 葡萄牙住房紧张加剧，房价创 1988 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 葡萄牙的房价创下了有史以来的最大涨幅，凸显出住房紧张状况日益恶化，对政府的应对措施构成了考验。【原文：Portugal’s home prices posted their biggest increase on record, underscoring a worsening housing crunch that’s testing the government’s response.】

item.title: 阿瑟-海斯家族办公室为收购基金寻求 2.5 亿美元投资
item.description: 亚瑟-海斯（Arthur Hayes）的家族办公室正在为其首支私募股权基金寻求至少 2.5 亿美元的资金，该基金的目标是中型加密货币公司。【原文：The family office of Arthur Hayes is seeking at least $250 million for a debut private equity fund targeting medium-sized crypto firms.】

item.title: Verisure 在首次公开募股（Blockbuster IPO）后一周报告数据泄露事件
item.description: Verisure PLC 向瑞典警方报告了一起数据泄露事件，原因是与该公司一家瑞典子公司有关的信息被未经授权的一方访问，而此时距离该公司在斯德哥尔摩证券交易所成功上市仅一周多时间。【原文：Verisure PLC has reported a data breach to the Swedish police after information connected to one of its Swedish subsidiaries was accessed by an unauthorized party, just over a week after the firm successfully listed its shares on the Stockholm stock exchange in a blockbuster IPO.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利加入华尔街同行行列，提供高等级债券
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）已开始销售多达五个部分的投资级债券，这是本周华尔街大型公司在发布第三季度业绩后进行的第三笔此类交易。【原文：Morgan Stanley has begun marketing investment-grade bonds in as many as five parts, the third such deal by a major Wall Street firm this week following the release of third-quarter results.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长斯莱鹏称政策形势良好，但可能不会一直保持下去
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员奥拉夫-斯莱鹏（Olaf Sleijpen）表示，欧洲央行的货币政策已准备就绪，但如果数据或预测发生变化，官员们必须做出反应。【原文：The European Central Bank’s monetary policy is well positioned but officials must react should data or forecasts shift, according to Governing Council member Olaf Sleijpen.】

item.title: 车价再创新高，汽车贷款拖欠率飙升 50
item.description: 一项新的研究显示，在过去 15 年里，汽车贷款从最安全的消费信贷产品变成了风险最高的产品之一，因为在汽车价格飙升和利率上升的推动下，汽车贷款拖欠率上升了 50%以上。【原文：Car loans have gone from the safest consumer credit products to among the riskiest over the last 15 years as delinquencies rose more than 50%, driven by soaring car prices and rising interest rates, a new study shows.】

item.title: 消息称贝莱德支持的苏伊士停止出售中国水务资产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Suez SA, a French water and waste-treatment company partly owned by BlackRock Inc., has paused a process to sell Chinese assets as it wants to keep growing in the world’s second-largest economy for longer, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片制造商寒武纪销售额飙升 14 倍，英伟达被拒之门外
item.description: 汇川技术公司（Cambricon Technologies Corp. ）报告称，该公司的季度收入激增了 14 倍，这是最明显的迹象之一，表明在国内人工智能发展的热潮中，中国的芯片制造商正在从取代受限制的英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Cambricon Technologies Corp. reported a 14-fold surge in quarterly revenue, one of the starkest signs yet of how China’s chipmakers are benefiting from a national drive to replace restricted Nvidia Corp. gear during a domestic AI development boom.】

item.title: 波兰拒绝向德国引渡北溪管道嫌疑人
item.description: 华沙地区法院拒绝将一名涉嫌参与破坏北溪天然气管道的乌克兰人引渡到德国。【原文：A Warsaw district court denied the extradition to Germany of a Ukrainian national suspected of involvement in the sabotage of the Nord Stream gas pipeline.】

item.title: 澳大利亚吸引华尔街公司参与中国多元化游戏
item.description: 澳大利亚财政部长吉姆-查莫斯（Jim Chalmers）将于周五在纽约会见主要投资者，向全球资本推介澳大利亚是一个稳定、资源丰富的投资目的地，也是努力实现关键供应链多样化（远离中国）的重要合作伙伴。【原文：Australian Treasurer Jim Chalmers will meet with major investors in New York on Friday, pitching his country as a stable, resource-rich destination for global capital and a key partner in efforts to diversify critical supply chains away from China.】

item.title: 日本电力市场繁荣终于有望带来利润
item.description:
来自世界各地的电力交易商将于下周齐聚东京，以期在全球增长最快的能源市场之一占据一席之地。【原文：

Electricity traders from around the world will be in Tokyo next week to gain a foothold in one of the world’s fastest-growing energy markets.

】

item.title: 索纳、阿波罗做空汽车供应商 Adler Pelzer 的债券
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，索纳资产管理公司（Sona Asset Management）、阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）和阿克布鲁克资本公司（Axebrook Capital）等基金正在做空Adler Pelzer Holding GmbH的债务，押注这家汽车零部件制造商将难以为其债务进行再融资。【原文：Funds including Sona Asset Management, Apollo Global Management and Axebrook Capital are shorting the debt of Adler Pelzer Holding GmbH on a bet that the auto-parts manufacturer will struggle to refinance its debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对 SVB 式动荡的担忧使区域优先股成为焦点
item.description: Zions Bancorp 和 Western Alliance Bancorp 的问题使美国地区性银行的优先股成为关注焦点，人们担心该行业将出现上次硅谷银行倒闭时的大跌。【原文：Trouble at Zions Bancorp and Western Alliance Bancorp have put US regional banks’ preferred shares in the spotlight on concern the sector is poised for a selloff last seen when Silicon Valley Bank collapsed.】

item.title: Solaris 的未来与 xAI 在人工智能热潮中的成功息息相关
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，卡门-阿罗约（Carmen Arroyo）将报道人工智能热潮中鲜为人知的受益者之一。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Carmen Arroyo reports on one of the little-known beneficiaries of the AI boom.】

item.title: 白蚁侵蚀美元基础，但缺乏替代方案
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的一名经济学编辑，今天我们来看看对美元前期金融的最新评估。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, today we’re looking at the latest assessment’s of the dollar’s pre-eminance. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 智利的 1.17 亿美元骗局导致通胀预期下降
item.description: 过度热心的智利官员承认，他们在制定电费时重复计算了通货膨胀。这一供认使未来一年的价格增长预期低于 3% 的目标，并导致能源部长丢掉了工作。【原文：Over-zealous officials in Chile have admitted they double counted inflation when setting electricity rates. That confession sent price-growth expectations for a year ahead below the target 3%, and led the energy minister to lose his job.】

item.title: 地区性银行退缩，投资者重温 SVB 往事
item.description:
两家地区性贷款机构涉嫌贷款欺诈，这让原本就对信贷风险感到紧张的投资者感到震惊。【原文：

Suspected loan fraud at two regional lenders is alarming investors who were already nervous about credit risks.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行西姆库斯称下行风险使进一步降息成为可能
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员格迪米纳斯-西姆库斯（Gediminas Simkus）表示，经济逆风可能要求欧洲中央银行在未来几个月进一步降低利率。【原文：Economic headwinds may require the European Central Bank to lower interest rates further in the months ahead, according to Governing Council member Gediminas Simkus.】

item.title: 中国人民银行誓言采取措施促进人民币在全球的使用
item.description: 中国政府承诺为在岸和海外机构使用人民币提供更多便利，这也是在全球推广人民币的努力之一。【原文：Chinese authorities pledged to make it easier for onshore and overseas institutions to use the yuan, part of their push to promote the currency globally.】

item.title: 金属交易商迎来有史以来利润最高的一年
item.description: 在一系列供应动荡将价格推向历史新高并推动全球金属流动发生巨大变化之后，全球金属贸易商迎来了有史以来利润最高的一年。【原文：The world’s metal traders are enjoying their most profitable ever year, after a series of supply upheavals propelled prices toward record highs and drove huge shifts in metal moving across the globe.】

item.title: OpenAI 与博通和 AMD 的交易表明人工智能市场有多大
item.description: OpenAI与Advanced Micro Devices Inc.和Broadcom Inc.达成购买芯片的协议，表明人工智能行业的发展空间远远超出了头号巨头英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：OpenAI’s agreements to buy chips from Advanced Micro Devices Inc. and Broadcom Inc. are demonstrating how much room the artificial intelligence industry has to grow beyond top dog Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷债务被一笔勾销，为 Invesco AT1 ETF 增色不少
item.description: 交易商们正在关注一只交易所交易基金，以获得瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse Group AG）被清偿的额外一级债务的潜在赔偿资格。【原文：Traders are homing in on a single exchange-traded fund in their bid to qualify for potential compensation from the wiped-out Additional Tier 1 debt of Credit Suisse Group AG.】
